TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemoteArgumentArrayContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract, class System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentEnumerableContract, class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract
type IRemoteArgumentArrayContract = interface interface IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract interface IRemoteArgumentEnumerableContract interface IContract

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract> to pass an array of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> objects between contracts by reference.
An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract> does not dynamically resize itself. If you need to use a collection that dynamically resizes itself, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract> interface.
